>
[Redsand Hourglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1815)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 78</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This platinum hourglass is filled with red sand, is decorated with imagery of roses and whippoorwills with tiny black onyx eyes, and has the ability to manipulate time. Once used by [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) herself, the _Redsand Hourglass_ was stolen from Pharasma's court a millennia ago. While the hourglass is in your possession, you're immune to the [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35), and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) conditions.

<document level="2" id="action-1510" />

<document level="2" id="action-1511" />

<document level="2" id="action-1512" />

**Destruction** The _Redsand Hourglass_ is destroyed if it's used within the [Dimension of Time](/Planes.aspx?ID=21).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
